title: Handle a Customer's Tax-Exempt Status
description: A new customer (e.g., a school or non-profit) is tax-exempt and provides their exemption certificate.

tasks.description: Receive the tax-exempt certificate from the customer.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the certificate is legitimate.

tasks.description: Update the customer's account to be tax-exempt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully flags the account as tax-exempt, ensuring future orders are not charged sales tax.
